formatDescription: SPSS (Statistical Package for the Social Sciences) is a software package used for statistical analysis in the social sciences. The portable data format is designed for data transfer between differing operating systems and versions of SPSS.
provenanceCompoundName: Digital Preservation Department / The National Archives

internalSignatures.name: SPSS Portable
internalSignatures.note: From the format description (http://www.gnu.org/software/pspp/pspp-dev/html_node/Portable-File-Header.html): "The first 200-byte segment is divided into five 40-byte sections, each of which represents the string charset SPSS PORT FILE in a different character set encoding, where charset is the name of the character set used in the file, e.g. ASCII or EBCDIC. Each string is padded on the right with spaces in its respective character set." The order is: EBCDIC, 7-bit ASCII, CDC 6-bit ASCII, 6-bit ASCII, Honeywell 6-bit ASCII.
